Introducing Hercules - HTML Theme

Thank you for purchasing our product! We are very glad that you have decided on our HTML theme.

The theme is very easy to use and we are here to guide and help you, so please read and follow the instructions and if you have further questions write us a email assistwordpress@gmail.com. This documentation is more of a reference work if you do not know what to do and need a better understanding on how the template is built write us a email.

Modification

To the Top

Hercules has been merged from a 2 versions in to 1 version with full-one page and multi-page, so in total it has 21 pages:

  • index.html - HomePage
  • index-one-page.html - One-page Home
  • post.html - Single Post page
  • project.html - Single Project page
  • about.html - About page
  • blog.html - Blog page
  • blog-2-ls.html - Blog 2 columns with left sidebar page
  • blog-2-rs.html - Blog 2 columns with right sidebar page
  • blog-3-ls.html - Blog 3 columns with left sidebar page
  • contacts.html - Contact page
  • classes.html - Classes page
  • error-404.html - Error 404 page
  • timetable.html - Timetable page
  • trainers.html - Trainers page
  • shortcodes.html - Shortcodes page
  • gallery-2.html - Gallery 2 columns page
  • gallery-3.html - Gallery 3 columns page
  • gallery-4.html - Gallery 4 columns page
  • shop.html - Shop page
  • single-product.html - Single Product page
  • cart.html - Cart page
  • login-register.html - Login/Register page

A screen of the Home Page:


All the themes elements like the Testimonial, event, services, skills etc. are all separated DIV-s that can be used on any page you want.

The themes includes javascripts files:

  • modernizr.custom.63321.js
  • jquery-1.10.0.min.js
  • jquery-ui.min.js
  • bootstrap.js
  • placeholder.js
  • imagesloaded.pkgd.min.js
  • masonry.pkgd.js
  • jquery.swipebox.min.js
  • farbtastic/farbtastic.js
  • options.js
  • plugins.js

Modify your email here to recive emails from contact form:

CSS Files and Structure

To the Top

This theme has been implemented as a responsive layout. The full width of the template is fluid for screen mode, and it still has a boxed version.

The CSS file is located in the css folder. The css file is registered and included in the "head"..."/head".

CSS file is very good structured and arranged so you can search very easy: 

/* === START HEADER === */
.top-header {
  margin-top: -90px;
}
header {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 100;
}
.single-page header .header-iterior {
  border-bottom: 0;
}
header .header-iterior {
  padding: 30px 0;
  position: relative;
  border-bottom: 6px solid #ec005f;
}
.single-page header .logo a {
  color: #454345;
}
header .logo a {
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 26px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-weight: 800;
}
header .logo a span {
  color: #ec005f;
}
.menu ul {
  text-align: right;
}
.menu ul li {
  display: inline-block;
  *zoom: 1;
  *display: inline;
}
.menu ul li i {
  font-size: 16px;
  cursor: pointer;
  color: #363636;
}
.menu ul li i:hover,
.single-page .menu ul li a:hover,
.single-page .menu ul li.active a,
.menu ul li a:hover,
.menu ul li.active a {
  color: #ec005f;
}
.single-page .menu ul li a {
  color: #454345;
}
.menu ul li a {
  display: block;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 16px;
  padding: 0 25px;
  font-weight: 400;
}
/* === END HEADER === */
